name: Aditya Birla (Wellness)
description: Multiply by Aditya Birla Wellness is an app that rewards you for exercising, thus inspiring you to reach your health goals. With easy access to gyms and atness centres around you, every step you take towards living a healthier life is rewarded through offers and discounts on a variety of products and services. Now healthy living is not just easy, but also rewarding.
features: Earn cashback on your wearable device
Headline: Stay Fit, Get Rewarded!
ShortDescription: India’s 1st Wellness and Rewards program. A program that actually rewards you from day 1 for getting healthy.
enhanced_description: Aditya Birla Wellness's 'Multiply' is an innovative mobile application and India's first wellness and rewards program designed to inspire and reward individuals for their health-conscious efforts. It incentivizes exercising by offering rewards, offers, and discounts on various products and services, including cashback on wearable devices. The app facilitates easy access to a network of gyms and fitness centers, making healthy living both accessible and financially rewarding from day one.
key_use_cases: Promoting employee health and wellness through incentives
Encouraging physical activity and healthy habits among employees
Providing access to a network of fitness facilities and health-related discounts
Driving employee engagement and happiness through a rewarding wellness program
Integrating with wearable devices to track and reward fitness activities
competitive_advantages: Positioned as 'India's 1st Wellness and Rewards program'
Offers immediate rewards ('rewards you from day 1 for getting healthy')
Provides tangible benefits like cashback on wearable devices and discounts on a variety of products/services
Offers easy access to a network of gyms and fitness centers
integration_capabilities: Wearable device data integration (for cashback and tracking)
roi_benefits: Motivation for healthy living through financial incentives (rewards, discounts, cashback)
